name: Joseph R. BUSIN and Edrie M. Busin, his wife, Appellants, v. Francis L. WHITING and Eleanor D. Whiting, his wife, Appellees

parties: Joseph R. BUSIN and Edrie M. Busin, his wife, Appellants, v. Francis L. WHITING and Eleanor D. Whiting, his wife, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The order of Superior Court is reversed and the case is remanded to the Court of Common Pleas of Lawrence County for further proceedings. See Bensalem Township School District v. Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, 518 Pa. 581, 544 A.2d 1318 (1988).
LARSEN and PAPADAKOS, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
570 A.2d 508
Joseph R. BUSIN and Edrie M. Busin, his wife, Appellants, v. Francis L. WHITING and Eleanor D. Whiting, his wife, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 28, 1989.
Decided Sept. 28, 1989.
